flavor: "Tell Father I have gone to make him proud."
name: Ser Edmure Tully
text: Reaction: After a character gains power, move 1 power from that character to a House Tully character. (Limit once per round.)

name: Bear Island
text: Reaction: After you marshal a loyal character, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Renly Baratheon
text: Insight. Renown. While another player controls a King character, Renly Baratheon cannot be saved. Reaction: After you draw a loyal card using insight, reveal it to draw a card.

name: Golden Rose Crown
text: Lord character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Action: Discard a card from your hand to give attached character +X STR. X is the number of attached character's different icons. (Limit twice per round).

flavor: "The Lord Commander's place is at Castle Black, lording and commanding."
name: Thoren Smallwood
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challange as the defending player, gain 1 power for your faction.

name: Night Gathers...
text: Marshalling Action: Choose an opponent whose reserve value is lower than yours. Until the end of the phase, you may marshal characters from that player's discard pile as if they were in your hand.

name: Asshai Priestess
text: Reaction: After you marshal Asshai Priestess，choose and kneel a character with STR 2 or lower.

flavor: "The shadows come to dance, my lord, dance my lord, dance my lord..." <cite>Patchface</cite>
name: Visited by Shadows
text:
Opponent's character only.
Attached character gets -1 STR.

name: Ser Amory Lorch
text: While your opponent controls three or fewer characters, Ser Amory Lorch gains renown.

name: Harrenhal
text: Action: Kneel Harrenhal to put a [lannister] or Bolton character into play. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

flavor: Beneath the dubious protection of the fish-ridden little castle lay the village of Lordsport, its harbor aswarm with ships.
name: Lordsport Fisherman
text: Reaction: After you marshal Lordsport Fisherman, add the bottom card of your deck to your hand.

name: King of Salt and Rock
text: Ironborn character only. Attached character gains the King trait and pillage. Reaction: When an attachment or location is discarded using pillage, attached character gains 1 power.

flavor: ...a bloodrider was more than a guard. They were the khal's brothers, his shadows, his fiercest friends.
name: Devoted Bloodrider
text: Each Bloodrider character you control gets +1 STR.

flavor: "Jhogo was the first to lay his arakh at her feet."
name: Blood of My Blood
text: Challenges Action: Search your deck for a Bloodrider character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.

name: Spearmaiden
text: Reaction: After Spearmaiden is declared as an attacker during a [military] challenge, choose a character controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 5 or more STR, the opponent must choose that character to satisfy claim (if able).

name: Scorpion's Sting
text: Reaction:: After you lose a challenge, choose up to X [martell] characters. Each chosen character gain renown until the end of the phase. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

flavor: By midday Hot Pie had begun to complain.
name: Hot Pie
text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a Companion character to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1.

name: The God's Eye
text:
The God's Eye cannot be discarded from play.
+1 Income.
+1 Reserve.

name: Disagreement
text: Marshaling Action: Choose an Ally character, and discard it from play.

name: Battle of Oxcross
text: Each character with printed cost 4 or higher cannot be declared as a defender during the first challenge you initiate this round.
